name: 10K Taps
description:
Can you tap? 10K TAPS is the endless counting and tapping challenge.

Watch the number on the next cube and try to tap as many times as needed to match the number. Don’t tap too much, don’t tap too little. Just keep tapping!

Just tap the screen to increase the number on your cube and match the next figure. Collect little yellow coins and unlock new cool characters!

Tips: Rush hour? Surprise for tapping with 2 fingers!
